id: Air Strikes on Strategic Yemeni Port
paragraph:
Fresh air strikes on the Yemeni port of Hodeidah.Fresh air strikes on the Yemeni port of Hodeidah.Also in the programme, we speak to the husband of Asia Bibi, the Christian Pakistani woman acquitted of blasphemy charges, and we'll find out how a small man came to run a very large drug cartel.PHOTO: A deadly air strike in northern Yemen in August 2018 killed more than 40 children.
